hero.name: LAWRENCE SU
hero.title: Full Stack Developer

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Full Stack Developer & Mobile App Specialist
about.intro: I am a passionate full-stack developer with expertise in React Native and cross-platform mobile development. My journey in software development has been driven by a desire to create innovative solutions that make a real difference in people's daily lives.

experience.title: Professional Experience
experience.subtitle: Building innovative solutions across different industries

ibm.title: React Native Developer
ibm.description: Led the development of cross-platform mobile applications using React Native, collaborated with international teams, and implemented scalable solutions for enterprise clients.

liansheng.title: Frontend Developer
liansheng.description: Developed responsive web applications and mobile interfaces, optimized user experience, and maintained high-quality code standards.

goldsource.title: Software Developer
goldsource.description: Built full-stack applications, integrated third-party APIs, and contributed to product development lifecycle from concept to deployment.

lilt.title: Junior Developer
lilt.description: Supported development of translation and localization tools, gained experience in AI-powered language technologies, and contributed to international product development.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Let's work together on your next project
contact.description: I'm always interested in new opportunities and exciting projects. Whether you have a question or just want to say hello, feel free to reach out!
